Uses of Class
org.netbeans.api.search.provider.SearchInfo

  • Packages that use SearchInfo 
    Package Description
    org.netbeans.api.search.provider
    Classes that you may need to work with if you are implementing a custom search provider.
    org.netbeans.api.search.ui
    Helpers for creating UI controls for your search provider that are similar to controls in the default provider.
    org.netbeans.spi.search
    This package contains classes that you can subclass and register to lookups of nodes if you want to specify how the nodes should be searched.

      Creates a SearchInfo compound of the given delegates.

      Create a new SearchInfo for a SearchInfoDefinition instance.

      Create a search info for a FileObject.

      Create a search info for an array of FileObjects.
      static SearchInfo SearchInfoUtils.findDefinedSearchInfo(Node node)
      Get a search info for a node, if it was explicitly defined in node's lookup, or in lookup of a ancestor node.

      Gets a search info for node.
